name: Don't Bring a Dog to a Gunfight!
name_original: Don't Bring a Dog to a Gunfight!
description:
Don't Bring a Dog to a Gunfight is a 3D 3rd person, crawling, sliding, dog-based tactical espionage title.  All code, art, and audio assets made within 2 days for Ludum Dare 46!

Explore and navigate the old town without disrupting the ensuing gunfight.  The more you're seen the more cautious the shooters are (no one want's to accidentally shoot a helpless pup).  If you distract them too much and the gunfight dies down, they are bound to try to round you up.  But the diner bell is ringing on the other side of town, so don't get caught before you can get to your fresh bowl of grizzle.

NOTE: A Controller is recommended for this game.

  • Jump:     'Bottom' or 'Right' Button  ||| Spacebar
  • Crouch:    Right Trigger |||  C
  • Dash:    Crouch while Jumping!
